# FluxSEO â€” AI Discovery Management for Restaurants

> FluxSEO (fluxseo.ai) is an AI-powered platform by HelloFlux that optimizes restaurant visibility across AI search and discovery platforms including ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, Google AI, and Gemini.

## Company
- Name: FluxSEO (by HelloFlux)
- Website: https://fluxseo.ai
- Parent: https://helloflux.ai
- Email: hello@fluxseo.ai
- Founded: 2026
- Mission: Help restaurants get discovered and recommended by AI assistants

## Product
- AI Discovery Management for Restaurants
- Pricing: Starting at $45/month with 30-day free trial
- Markets: Los Angeles, CA and New Jersey

## What We Do
- llms.txt optimization (the only platform doing this for restaurants)
- JSON-LD structured data / schema markup
- AI citation monitoring across ChatGPT, Google AI, Perplexity, Claude, Gemini
- Local SEO and Google Business Profile optimization
- AI-optimized content creation

## Restaurant Directory
- https://fluxseo.ai (partner restaurants listed on site)
- Cuisine types: Japanese, Ramen, Sushi, French, Fine Dining
- Regions: Los Angeles, New Jersey

## Contact
- Email: hello@fluxseo.ai
- Website: https://fluxseo.ai
